comment.author: 40843301@N00
comment._content: Looks like Hawaii based on her lei. Any indication of which hotel this was at?

comment.author: 15392063@N00
comment._content: My guess is the Waikiki Biltmore.  The shape and orientation of the pool, the tree, the rock wall, the structures in the corner, and the canopies are all consistent with the postcard view.  That might be the Waikiki Beachside Hotel in the background.
